# Citrix Products or Equivalent

## Call for Proposal Overview

The Government of Canada's Shared Services Canada (SSC) is soliciting bids for the procurement of Citrix Products or Equivalent hardware with 24/7 maintenance and support. The requirement is for a new hardware upgrade to replace the existing end-of-life Citrix ADC 8905 appliances used by Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council (NSERC) and Social Sciences and Humanities Research Council (SSHRC).

## Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: SSC-23-00023866:T
* **Amendment Number**: 4
* **Solicitation Number**: BPM019595/23866
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 10, 2023, 3:00 PM EST
* **Contracting Entity**: Shared Services Canada (90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, ON K0A 0C3, Canada)
* **Contact Information**: Oliver Librada, Senior Procurement Specialist (343-542-8460, oliver.librada@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
* **Bid Submission**: Bids must be submitted via Public Services and Procurement Canada’s (PSPC) Procurement tool (P2P)

## Tender Description

The procurement seeks the supply of Citrix NetScaler 5900Z or equivalent hardware with 24/7 maintenance and support. The new hardware will replace the existing end-of-life Citrix ADC 8905 appliances, ensuring compatibility, interoperability, and interchangeability with the current design. The bid response must include a detailed description of the proposed solution, including any ancillary services or support required.

## Trade Agreements

The tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

## Regions of Delivery and Opportunity

The tender is open to all regions of the world and Canada.

## Important Dates

* **Amendment Date**: October 6, 2023
* **Publication Date**: September 21, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 10, 2023, 3:00 PM EST
